overview:
Robert Kalin is the founder and CEO of Etsy. Robert served as CEO from founding until August 2008. In December 2009, Kalin came back in as CEO.

Befor founding Etsy, Robert was a woodworker and carpenter. He attended 5 colleges including the School of the Museum of Fine Arts, MIT and NYU before graduating with a BA in individualized study in 2004.
